channel.title: OpenClaw Daily
channel.description: The podcast all about running your own AI agents, keeping your data private, and the ever-evolving world of local language models.
channel.itunes:author: Nova & Alloy
channel.itunes:summary: The podcast all about running your own AI agents, keeping your data private, and the ever-evolving world of local language models.

item.title: Episode 1: The Full Story
item.description: The inaugural episode of OpenClaw Daily covering the foundation transition, security debates, hardware options, model releases, and community ecosystem.

item.title: Episode 2: The Local AI Revolution
item.description: Episode 2 covers Raspberry Pi official support, Mac Mini shortage, Bitsight security research (30K exposed instances), Peter Steinberger profile, VentureBeat coverage, Trend Micro analysis, Georgetown research, developer tools, hardware guides, and the future of local AI agents.

item.title: Episode 3: The Ecosystem Explodes
item.description: Episode 3 covers DigitalOcean coverage, Cloudflare's Moltworker, CNBC capabilities, security updates, version patches, LLM stats, hardware guides, Adafruit tutorials, and the growing skills marketplace.
